name: Therm-a-Rest ProLite Plus WV Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: A 3-season pad that offers a great night’s sleep. The WingLock™ valve inflates and deflates fast. It’s has a tapered cut and rounded corners to shave weight, but the foam is thicker and the pieces are diagonally cut rather than punched out. This difference skims a little more weight and limits the amount of heat you lose to convection.50-denier polyester ripstop top with a 50-denier, tough polyester bottom.Extra coating on the bottom increases its durability.WingLock valve is 3x faster than conventional valves.1-way airflow is quick and easy to operate even while wearing gloves.Deflates almost instantly.Highly compressible Atmos foam expands quickly and evenly when you open the valve.Stuff sack included.
